hunch.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if you have a hunch that something is true or will happen, you feel that it is true or will happen
hunch.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I had a hunch that something like this would happen.
My hunch is that she’s his mother.
hunch.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to bend down and forwards so that your back forms a curve
hunch.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He had to hunch over the steering wheel to see anything.
